tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE preferences (pref_id INT PRIMARY KEY,user_id INT NOT NULL,theme VARCHAR(20),language VARCHAR(20),notifications BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE);

CREATE TABLE settings (setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,user_id INT NOT NULL,enable_sounds BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,enable_notifications BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,background_color VARCHAR(10),FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE);
CREATE TABLE ar_experiences (exp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,exp_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,exp_description TEXT,exp_rating FLOAT,exp_url VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE user_ar_prefs (user_id INT NOT NULL,exp_id INT NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (user_id,exp_id),FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,FOREIGN KEY (exp_id) REFERENCES ar_experiences(exp_id) ON DELETE CASCADE);
